description: Load node modules according to tsconfig paths, in run-time or via API.

name: tsconfig-paths

scripts.postversion: git push --tags && yarn publish --new-version $npm_package_version && git push && echo "Successfully released version $npm_package_version!"
scripts.verify: yarn build && yarn lint && yarn coverage
